defaults.header: Why you will love building with qoob

features.title: Live Editing
features.text_feature: The live editor gives you an exact preview of your content, that you can edit in real-time. You can see all edits without leaving the page.

features.title: Alaways Looking Good
features.text_feature: QOOB automatically optimizes your website's pages for desktop, tablet and mobile. This ensures your visitors get the best viewing experience no matter what device they use.

features.title: Predefined blocks
features.text_feature: QOOB comes with many predefined blocks, so building and prototyping is crazy fast. Simply click, select, edit and enjoy stacking blocks to build your website. You will like it.
